name: Aerobic
effect: When a Temtem with this trait uses a Wind Technique, they get SPDEF and SPD.

name: Air Specialist
effect: Air Specialist increases the damage of the user's Wind Techniques by an additional 15%.

name: Amphibian
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Amphibian is attacked by a Water Technique, it gets SPD.

name: Anaerobic
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Anaerobic uses a Toxic Technique, it gets SPDEF and SPATK.

name: Apothecary
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Apothecary attacks with a Special Technique, if the target is an enemy, it inflicts the Poisoned Condition for 1 turn, or if the target is an ally or itself, it inflicts the Regenerated Condition for 1 turn.

name: Attack T
description: Currently, Attack T is unavailable, so its unknown what it's description is.
effect: Currently, Attack T is unavailable, so its unknown what it's full effect is.

name: Autotomy
effect: Autotomy causes the user to get the Evading Condition for 2 turns upon its first entry onto the battlefield.

name: Avenger
effect: A Temtem with Avenger gets SPATK and SPD whenever its ally is knocked out.

name: Benefactor
effect: Whenever the ally of the Temtem with Benefactor takes damage from a technique (no matter the target), they are healed by 10% of their max HP. This effect has no minimum value, meaning it can heal the ally for more HP than they lost due to getting attacked. It will only trigger if they take damage from the technique.

name: Body Stretch
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Body Stretch rests, it gains the Regenerated Condition for 2 turns.

name: Book Lungs
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Book Lungs takes damage from a Water technique, the damage is reduced by 30%.

name: Botanist
effect: Botanist increases the damage of the user's Nature Techniques by an additional 15%.

name: Botanophobia
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Botanophobia is attacked by a Nature Technique, the damage is increased by 50%.

name: Brawny
effect: A Temtem with Brawny has all damage done by Physical Techniques boosted by an additional 20%.

name: Bully
effect: If the number of allies conscious is greater than the number of enemies conscious, including Temtem not on the battlefield for both totals, then Temtem with Bully deal an additional 30% more damage.

name: Burglar
effect: When a Temtem with Burglar attacks another Temtem that has the Asleep Condition or the Exhausted Condition, the defender's gear will be disabled for the remainder of the combat.

name: Caffeinated
effect: Temtem with Caffeinated will never receive the Asleep Condition.

name: Callosity
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Callosity gets attacked by a Physical Technique, it then gets DEF.

name: Camaraderie
effect: When a Temtem with Camaraderie is attacked, if its ally is part of its evolutionary line, then it takes 50% less damage.

name: Channeler
effect: Special Techniques used by a Temtem with Channeler do 25% more damage.

name: Cobweb
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Cobweb causes another Temtem to get the Poisoned Condition, it also causes it to get the Trapped Condition for 2 turns.

name: Cold-Blooded
description: Instead of getting Cold, Temtem regenerates for 2 turns.
effect: If a Temtem with Cold-Blooded is inflicted with Cold Condition, it instead gains Regenerated Condition for 2 turns.

name: Cold-Natured
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Cold-Natured would get the Cold Condition, they instead get the Frozen Condition for the same amount of turns.

name: Comebacker
effect: When an attacker targets a Temtem with Comebacker, the attacker takes 50% increased damage for the rest of the turn.

name: Confined
effect: When a Temtem with Confined uses a technique that causes it to give itself the Trapped Condition, it also gets DEF and SPDEF.

name: Coward's Rest
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Coward's Rest rests, it gains the Evading Condition for 2 turns.

name: Deceit Aura
effect: At any turn in which a Temtem with Deceit Aura is present, the individual Temtem turn order is reversed. This reversal applies to the order in which techniques are used and the order in which Temtem are swapped. Techniques with Ultra Priority, Temtem swapping and item usage still occur prior to techniques.

name: Demoralize
effect: When a Temtem with Demoralize enters the battlefield, both enemies immediately get SPD, even if they are then immediately after swapped out.

name: Determined
effect: Temtem with Determined can never have its stats decreased by any amount of stages.

name: Dreaded Alarm
effect: Whenever the enemy of a Temtem with Dreaded Alarm rests, they lose 25% of their maximum HP.

name: Earthbound
effect: Earthbound gives the user DEF whenever they use an Earth technique.

name: Effective Denial
effect: Currently, Effective Denial is unobtainable, so it's unknown what its full effect is.

name: Efficient
effect: When a Temtem with Efficient uses an offensive technique, the technique costs 30% less stamina.

name: Electric Synthesize
effect: When a Temtem with Electric Synthesize is attacked with a damaging Electric Technique, it restores their HP equal to the amount of damage they would have received.

name: Energy Reserves
effect: If, at the end of the turn, the HP of a Temtem with Energy Reserves is below 40% of its maximum, the Temtem gets the Vigorized Condition for 2 turns and ATK. This will only happen once per battle.

name: Escapist
effect: While a Temtem with Escapist is on the battlefield, neither it nor its ally can get the Trapped Condition. Also, when it enters the battlefield, its ally loses the Trapped Condition if it has it.

name: Fainted Curse
effect: When a Temtem with Fainted Curse is knocked-out by a damage dealing Technique, the attacker loses 30% of their max HP.

name: Fast Charge
effect: When a Digital Temtem enters the battlefield, it gets SPD if its ally has Fast Charge.

name: Fever Rush
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Fever Rush receives any status condition, it also gets ATK.

name: Flawed Crystal
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Flawed Crystal takes damage from a technique that is either Mental, Toxic, or Electric, it takes 50% increased damage.

name: Friendship
effect: Whenever the ally of a Temtem with Friendship uses an offensive technique that would target it, the technique instead has no effects on that Temtem. If the technique also targeted enemies, they will still be affected.

name: Furor
effect: When the HP of a Temtem with Furor is below 33% of its maximum, the techniques it uses do 33% more damage.

name: Guardian
effect: The ally of a Temtem with Guardian cannot get the Cold Condition, Burned Condition, Poisoned Condition, or Doomed Condition, nor can it receive any negative stage changes to its stats.

name: Heat Discharge
effect: When a Temtem knocks out another Temtem with Heat Discharge, it gets the Burned Condition for 3 turns.

name: Hover
effect: Temtem with Hover take 50% less damage from Earth techniques.

name: Hurry-wart
effect: When a Temtem with Hurry-wart enters the battlefield, all its techniques with a Hold lose 1 Hold.

name: Hydrologist
effect: Hydrologist increases the damage of the user's Water Techniques by an additional 15%.

name: Immunity
effect: Toxic Techniques deal no damage to a Temtem with Immunity, and cannot be inflicted with the Poisoned Condition.

name: Individualist
description: Techniques targeting the ally will fail.
effect: Temtem with Individualist cannot affect their ally with offensive techniques. If the technique also targets enemies, they will still be affected.

name: Inductor
description: When a Electric technique is cast, restores 8% of max HP.
effect: Any time an Technique is used, all Temtem with Inductor on the field will restore 8% of their maximum HP.

name: Kinetic Transfer
description: Currently, Kinetic Transfer is unobtainable, so it's unknown what its description is.
effect: Currently, Kinetic Transfer is unobtainable, so it's unknown what its full effect is.

name: Last Rush
effect: Temtem with Last Rush get 50% increased ATK, SPATK, and SPD if all their allies are knocked-out.

name: Loneliness
effect: Temtem with Loneliness can't use Synergies with its ally and the ally can't use synergies with it.

name: Marathonist
description: When attacking, gets SPD, and STA cost reduced is 50%.
effect: Marathonist causes the user to get SPD when attacking, but the stamina cost of the attack is reduced by 50%.

name: Mental Alliance
effect: Temtem with Mental Alliance get a 15% increase to their SPATK if their ally is Mental.

name: Mirroring
description: When attacked with a Special technique, the attacker gets 25% knockback damage.
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Mirroring receives damage from a Special technique, the attacker receives 25% of the damage as well if the Temtem wasn't knocked out.

name: Mithridatism
effect: Temtem with Mithridatism never receive the Poisoned Condition.

name: Motivator
description: At the start of the turn, allies restore 10% of STA.
effect: At the start of the turn, if a Temtem with Motivator is on the battlefield, all its allies, including those not on the battlefield, restore 10% of their maximum STA.

name: Mucous
description: Damage taken from Electric techniques is reduced by 30% and prevents the cold and burned status condition.
effect: Temtem with Mucous never receive the Cold Condition nor the Burned Condition. Additionally, they take 30% less damage from Techniques.

name: Neutrality
description: Prevent all status conditions.
effect: Temtem with Neutrality never receive any status conditions, including positive ones.

name: Parrier
description: Damage taken from physical techniques is reduced by 30%.
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Parrier is attacked by a Physical Technique, it takes 30% less damage.

name: Patient
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Patient uses a technique with a Hold, it restores 10% of its maximum STA.

name: Plethoric
effect: If a Temtem with Plethoric's HP is full, and it has not taken any damage, its SPD is increased by 30%.

name: Power Nap
description: At the start of the turn, restores 15% of max HP of an Asleep Temtem.
effect: At the start of the turn, if a Temtem with Power Nap has the Asleep Condition, it restores 15% of its maximum HP.

name: Prideful
description: When attacking, gets ATK, SPATK and SPD if the target gets knocked-out.
effect: When a Temtem with Prideful attacks another Temtem and knocks it out, it gets ATK, SPATK, and SPD.

name: Protector
description: When entering the battlefield, loses 10% of max HP and the ally gets DEF and SPDEF.
effect: When a Temtem with Protector enters the battlefield, it loses 10% of its maximum HP, and its ally gets DEF and SPDEF, even if the ally is immediately then swapped out.

name: Provident
description: When attacked by a Fire, Earth or Melee technique, gets SPDEF.
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Provident is attacked by a technique that is either , , or , it gets SPDEF.

name: Punching Bag
description: Damage taken from Melee techniques is reduced by 30%.
effect: If a Temtem with Punching Bag is attacked by a Technique, it takes 30% less damage.

name: Puppet Master
description: While HP is below 40%, received rival techniques get redirected to the ally.
effect: If a Temtem with Puppet Master becomes the target of a single-target attack while it HP is below 40%, its ally becomes the target instead.

name: Pyromaniac
description: Damage done with Fire techniques is increased by 15%.
effect: Pyromaniac increases the damage of the user's Fire Techniques by an additional 15%.

name: Receptive
effect: Temtem with Receptive have the duration of the Vigorized Condition, the Immune Condition, the Regenerated Condition, the Evading Condition, and the Alerted Condition increased by 1 turn.

name: Rejuvenate
description: When attacking with a physical technique, restore 20% of max HP.
effect: After attacking with a Physical Technique, if the attacking Temtem has Rejuvenate, it restores 20% of its maximum HP.

name: Resilient
effect: If a Temtem with Resilient is to knock itself out due to overexertion, it will instead survive with 1 HP.

name: Resistant
effect: Temtem with Resistant have the duration of the Cold Condition, the Asleep Condition, the Trapped Condition, the Seized Condition, the Poisoned Condition, the Burned Condition, and the Exhausted Condition decreased by 1 turn.

name: Rested
effect: Temtem with Rested gets an increase of 30% to its ATK and SPATK for the first 2 turns it is present on the battlefield.

name: Scavenger
effect: Whenever another Temtem, ally or enemy, is knocked out, the Temtem with Scavenger restores 20% of their maximum HP.

name: Self-Esteem
description: When attacking, removes all negative status conditions if the target gets knocked-out.
effect: When a Temtem with Self-Esteem attacks and knocks out a Temtem and is affected by the Cold Condition, the Trapped Condition, the Seized Condition, the Poisoned Condition, the Burned Condition, the Doomed Condition, the Isolated Condition, or the Exhausted Condition, the condition is removed.

name: Sensei
description: When attacking with a Physical technique, uses SPATK, and when attacking with a Special technique, uses the ATK.
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Sensei attacks with a Physical Technique, SPATK is used instead of ATK. Similarly, if it is a Special Technique, it uses ATK instead of SPATK.

name: Sentinel
description: When entering the battlefield, removes the asleep status condition on the ally and prevents the asleep status condition on the ally and itself.
effect: While a Temtem with Sentinel is on the battlefield, neither it nor the ally can get the Asleep Condition. Also, when it enters the battlefield, if the ally has the Asleep Condition, it loses it.

name: Settling
description: Increases ATK by 8% for each turn the Temtem stays in the battlefield.
effect: Each turn a Temtem with Settling is on the battlefield, its ATK increases by 8%. However, if it leaves the battlefield, this cumulative bonus is reset.

name: Shared Pain
effect: If a Temtem with Shared Pain is attacked twice in the same turn, the second attack gets redirected to the ally.

name: Skull Helmet
description: Damage taken from Mental or Melee techniques is reduced by 25%.
effect: Temtem with Skull Helmet take 25% less damage from techniques that are either or .

name: Snowstorm
description: When entering the battlefield for the first time, rivals and the ally get cold for 2 turns if they aren't cold already.
effect: When a Temtem with Snowstorm enters the battlefield, their ally and both rivals each get the Cold Condition for 2 turns if they do not already have the condition.

name: Soft Touch
effect: When a Temtem with Soft Touch attacks a target afflicted with the Asleep Condition with a damage dealing technique, the condition will not be removed.

name: Spoilsport
description: Damage done with multi-target techniques is increased by 25%.
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Spoilsport uses a Technique that can hit multiple targets, it does 25% more damage.

name: Spreader
description: Single-target special techniques become multi-target, and damage done with them is reduced by 33%.
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Spreader attacks with a Special Technique, the attack affects the entire target team instead but only deals ~66% damage.

name: Stabmaster
description: Damage done with matching type techniques is increased by 50%.
effect: When a Temtem with Stabmaster uses a technique that shares a type with it, it deals 50% extra damage in addition to the STAB bonus.

name: Strong Liver
description: When attacked with a Toxic technique, restores HP instead of receiving damage.
effect: When a Temtem with Strong Liver is attacked with a damaging Technique, it restores their HP equal to the amount of damage they would have recieved.

name: Synergy Master
description: Whenever a Temtem with Synergy Master or its ally uses a Synergy Technique, it does 25% more damage.

name: Tactical Strike
description: Damage done with Hold techniques is increased by 15%.
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Tactical Strike attacks with a technique with a hold of 1 or more, it deals 15% more damage.

name: Tardy Rush
effect: After a Temtem with Tardy Rush has been on the battlefield for 3 turns in a row, its SPD increases by 100% and its ATK by 10% until it leaves the battlefield. If it is swapped in, the turn it enters the battlefield counts as turn 1.

name: Team Elusive
description: Prevents multi-target techniques.
effect: When a Temtem, whether enemy or ally, uses a multi-target technique that would hit a Temtem with Team Elusive, instead, it isn't affected. If Puppet Master would cause a Temtem with Team Elusive to be the target of an attack, it will. Puppet Master does not trigger Team Elusive.

name: Thick Skin
effect: Temtem with Thick Skin take 50% less damage from Wind Techniques.

name: Tireless
description: Prevents the overexertion turn penalization.
effect: When a Temtem with Tireless overexerts, it doesn't lose its next turn. It will still be able to use a Technique.

name: Toxic Affinity
effect: Toxic Affinity multiplies the base damage of the user's Toxic Techniques by x1.5, as if the user had STAB (Same-Type Attack Bonus). This stacks with actual STAB if the user is also a Toxic Temtem, resulting in a total multiple of x2.25 (1.5 x 1.5).

name: Toxic Farewell
effect: When a Temtem knocks out a target with Toxic Farewell, it receives the Poisoned Condition for 3 turns.

name: Toxic Skin
description: When attacked with a physical technique, the attacker gets poisoned for 2 turns.
effect: When a Temtem uses a Physical Technique on a target with Toxic Skin, the attacker gets the Poisoned Condition for 2 turns.

name: Trance
description: Once per battle, if the Temtem is attacked and the HP is below 30%, gets asleep for 2 turns and regenerating for 3 turns, SPATK and SPDEF .
effect: If a Temtem with Trance is the target of a technique, and afterwards its HP is 30% or less of its maximum, it gets the Asleep Condition for 2 turns and the Regenerated Condition for 3 turns, and also gets SPATK and SPDEF. This is regardless of if the technique did damage, but Trance only can ever trigger once per battle.

name: Trauma
description: If hit by a Physical technique gets DEF; if hit by a Special technique, SPDEF.
effect: When a Temtem with Trauma takes damage from a Physical Technique, it gets DEF. When it is takes damage from a Special Technique, it gets SPDEF.

name: Tri-Apothecary
description: When attacking with a special technique, the target gets poisoned for 3 turns if it's a rival or regenerating for 3 turns if it's an ally or itself.
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Tri-Apothecary attacks using a Special Technique, if the target is an enemy, it inflicts the Poisoned Condition for 3 turns, or if the target is an ally or itself, it inflicts the Regenerated Condition for 3 turns.

name: Unnoticed
effect: When a Temtem with Unnoticed lasts a whole turn without being targeted by any rival attacks, it gets SPD.

name: Vigorous
description: Damage done when overexerting is increased by 50%.
effect: When Temtem with Vigorous use a technique that causes it to overexert, the damage is increased 50%.

name: Warm-Blooded
description: Prevents the Cold status condition.
effect: Temtem with Warm-Blooded will never receive the Cold Condition.

name: Water Affinity
effect: Water Affinity multiplies the base damage of the user's Water techniques by x1.5, as if the user had STAB (Same-Type Attack Bonus). This stacks with actual STAB if the user is also a Water type, resulting in a total multiple of x2.25 (1.5 x 1.5).

name: Water Custodian
description: Water techniques targeting the ally will target the Temtem instead.
effect: While a Temtem with Water Custodian is on the battlefield, any techniques that target the ally will target this Temtem instead.

name: Withdrawal
description: When resting, restores 15% of max HP and removes the asleep status condition.
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Withdrawal rests for their turn, they recover 15% of their maximum HP and if they had the Asleep Condition, they lose it.

name: Wrecked Farewell
description: When self knock-out, every Temtem loses 25% of max HP.
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Wrecked Farewell is knocked out by itself, such as by self-damaging techniques or by overexerting, all other Temtem, including allies, lose 25% of their maximum HP.
